## createDecorator() function

Create a decorator to be used at the entry point

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createDecorator(key: string | symbol): (target: any, targetKey: string, index: number) => void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string \| symbol | Key of the decorator |

<b>Returns:</b>

(target: any, targetKey: string, index: number) =&gt; void

The reference of value setted in middleware
